snippet: The film, written and directed by Clea DuVall, finds a group of 30-somethings gathering to encourage a married couple to break up....
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie The Intervention, written and directed by Clea DuVall, who also stars.
lead_paragraph: The film, written and directed by Clea DuVall, finds a group of 30-somethings gathering to encourage a married couple to break up.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The Intervention,’ There’s a Big Chill in the Air
